name: Terramachi: Battle Card Game
storyline: Terramachi: Battle Card Game is a roguelite card-playing auto-battler, consisting of over 100 evolutions of Machi (monsters), each with a unique ability. By playing cards, players develop their team of Machi; upgrading, evolving, or replacing team members after every round of battle against online opponents.
